meanings.definition: Biomedicines: Medicines that are used in the field of biomedicine.
meanings.sent1: The hospital stocked up on biomedicines to treat various illnesses.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often rely on biomedicines to help patients recover.
meanings.sent3: The biomedicines danced off the shelves as if eager to heal.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like biomedicines, bringing joy and comfort to all around.
meanings.sent5: In the dark times, biomedicines shone like beacons of hope.

meanings.definition: Biomedicines: Pharmaceutical products derived from biological sources.
meanings.sent1: The company specialized in producing biomedicines from natural materials.
meanings.sent2: Biomedicines have revolutionized the treatment of many diseases.
meanings.sent3: The biomedicines whispered secrets of nature's healing powers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was a dose of biomedicines, pure and effective.
meanings.sent5: The forest was a treasure trove of biomedicines waiting to be discovered.
